title: Interpretation of the sky in a dream. Dividing the sky in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the vision looking at the sky, whether it is blue, clear, cloudy, things descending from the sky, for single women, for married women, for pregnant women, according to Ibn Sirin. The symbol of Paradise in a dream: He is very lucky to see himself in Paradise without knowing when he ascended to it, and it is the news of his entry To heaven. Looking at the sky indicates that the dreamer is facing a big problem for him, and it also indicates that the dreamer is upset about something. Approaching heaven indicates approaching God if he is one of the people of obedience. The fall of the sky is the fall of the roof of the house or what covers the human being. The human being is as if He was in the lower heaven, a sign of transcendence and responsibility. The splitting of the sky and the emergence of an old man from it is a sign of goodness. The splitting of the sky and the emergence of a new man from it is a sign of aggression. The splitting of the sky and the emergence of sheep from it is a sign of spoils. The splitting of the sky and the emergence of camels from it means rain, and the appearance of a lion means an unjust ruler. The sky is green, which indicates a year Fruitful and good. The sky is yellow, which indicates the arrival of disease to the area. The sky is iron, which indicates a lack of rain. The gates of heaven are open to indicate a response to the invitation. If it is closed, rain is prevented from the people. Whoever dreams that he took the sky with his teeth, then the dream indicates anger at the ruler, or taking something He cannot hold it with his hands, and he does not praise. The fall of fire from the sky depends on where it falls. Its fall in the market is the rise in prices. The fall of dates, crops, and honey is good news for the dreamer and those around him. Interpretation of seeing the sky divided in a dream. If a person dreams of seeing the sky divided in a dream and sees that something bad will come out as something frightening and cause harm. For others, this dream was evidence that the dreamer will not have a good ending and is committing sins. Therefore, life has a bad ending. If a person dreams of seeing the sky divided in a dream, as if something good had come out of it and led to the dreamer feeling happy and reassured, then this dream was evidence that the good deeds performed by the dreamer would come to an end. Good and you will obtain good in this world and the hereafter, God willing. If an unmarried girl dreams of seeing the sky open and everything that pleases her heart comes out, then this dream was evidence that she will soon receive happy news about her engagement or marriage. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing the sky divided in a dream This is good news for her that she will give birth soon, God willing. Interpretation of the sky in a dream: Whoever dreams of himself looking at the sky in a dream is in reality a person with a strong personality. He helps others and is satisfied with what God has assigned to him. If a person sees himself in a dream looking at the sky at night It is full of stars, so this dream is evidence that the dreamer is religious and close to God. The stars in the dream are a metaphor for angels, and the crescent moon in a dream is a metaphor for the husband. Whoever dreamed of seeing the sky but looked at it through binoculars, then this dream was a sign that the dreamer would deepen in knowledge. If he sees in his dream that he sees something strange through binoculars, then this dream is evidence that the dreamer will receive good news.

Whoever dreamed of seeing the sky but looked at it through binoculars, then this dream was a sign that the dreamer would deepen in knowledge. If he sees in his dream that he sees something strange through binoculars, then this dream is evidence that the dreamer will receive good news.

title: Fear of a turtle in a dream

preview.html: Dream interpretation scholars have also confirmed that seeing fear of a turtle in a dream is one of the strange visions that worries some people. Through today’s article, we present to you the interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream in general. Interpretation of fear of a turtle in a dream. Fear of a turtle in a dream indicates the dreamer’s abandonment of the qualities of arrogance and arrogance. Which distinguishes it. The dream of being afraid of a turtle in a dream illustrates the necessity of following the principles of religion, education in society, and good morals. Whoever sees that he is afraid of the turtle in his dream, this symbolizes the fear of telling the truth, and returning the truth to its owners. The vision also indicates the dreamer’s fear of an important woman. It is large in society and has a high status and a high position among people and above it. If a man sees a wild turtle in a dream, this is a warning of the dangers and problems that surround him and that may cause him harm. The vision may indicate the presence of a cunning person near the dreamer, planning or plotting deception. It is said Being afraid of a turtle in a dream indicates fear of the future and what will happen in it, and fear of something unknown for fear of failure and despair. As for dreaming of escaping from a turtle, it means that you are dealing with people of knowledge and religion, opposing them, living in falsehood, and not supporting the truth. Interpretation of fear Of the turtle in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin believes that fear of the turtle in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s confusion in making certain fateful decisions in his life. This, in turn, can create for him some problems and risks as a result of his hesitation and intense fear of the future. If the dreamer sees in a dream a wild turtle Scared, this indicates that there is someone close to him who has a grudge against him. He has some feelings of hatred and it can cause him harm and evil. This vision is evidence that the dreamer should be more careful when dealing with those around him. Ibn Sirin explained that fear of a turtle in a dream indicates The dreamer exaggerates things and exaggerates them a lot. As a result of his intense fear of future events, and that he is a person who is very afraid of the future and the unknown. Read also: Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream. Interpretation of fear of a turtle in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a turtle in a dream for a girl is considered one of the praiseworthy visions, It indicates good news and the fulfillment of her ambitions and goals. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is afraid of a turtle, this is a sign of anxiety, tension, and her feeling of fear of the problems she faces. Her inability to make decisive decisions in some matters, and her extreme hesitation all the time. Also, A dream about being afraid of a turtle in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates a close marriage with someone close to her. But her extreme embarrassment and fear of the future makes her very hesitant to make the right decision. Therefore, this dream is considered a warning to an unmarried woman to control her behavior, which exaggerates matters, and exaggerates Severe in its reaction. The need to think things carefully, so as not to make wrong decisions, and the need to take things simply. Interpretation of fear of a turtle in a dream for a married woman. Fear of a turtle may indicate

title: What is the interpretation of beautiful hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Beautiful hair in Al-Manamiri interpreters that the dream is a sign of good, but it portends evil in some cases, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing beautiful hair for single, married and pregnant women in the language of Ibn Sirin and. Its interpretation is from its great scholars. Beautiful hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin Beautiful hair in a dream The interpretation of a dream about beautiful hair for a man indicates abundant livelihood and a lot of money that he will get soon and it also shows success and brilliance in practical life. In the event that the dreamer sees that his hair is beautiful but contains some knots, The dream suggests that there are some obstacles in his life at the present time, but he will overcome them soon. If the fortuneteller sees his beautiful hair falling out in a dream, this means that he will fall into great trouble in the coming days or that he will suffer a material loss and an indication of illness, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. . Long hair in the vision indicates longevity, and red hair indicates hatred and aggression, but if the dreamer feels happy to see it, the dream indicates that he will receive a lot of money from a loved one in the future. Period. Beautiful hair in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Thick or long hair in the vision symbolizes increased financial income and continued health and well-being. If the dreamer dreams that he is removing his hair, the dream indicates that he will soon get rid of his problems and overcome the difficult circumstances he is going through. If the owner An insightful person is going through difficulties at the present time and dreams that he has untangled his hair and arranged it in a beautiful way, as this indicates relief from his distress and alleviation of the problems that worry him. Red hair, and this indicates that feelings of love control him and control his actions. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Beautiful hair in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about beautiful hair for a single woman is an indicator However, she will soon marry a handsome man who will make her happy days and live the most beautiful moments with him. If the visionary is a seeker of knowledge and dreams that she is combing her beautiful hair, then the dream indicates her success in her studies and obtaining the highest grades. If her hair is black in the dream and a different color in reality, then this It indicates that she is a good girl who everyone loves and respects. If the hair is blonde in a dream, this indicates success in life and the bright future that awaits her. Seeing long hair in a dream for a girl with short hair is in reality evidence that God Almighty will relieve her of her distress and bless her life. A woman's thick hair indicates her success in her social life and the presence of many friends, but curly hair symbolizes the heavy responsibilities she bears. Beautiful long hair in a dream for a single woman indicates an increase in her money and a long life. The dream also indicates her culture, intelligence, and high status, and the color black. Her long hair symbolizes the happiness that the dreamer feels in the current period. The dream indicates blessing, success, and prosperity

title: Interpretation of killing a lizard in a dream: Seeing a lizard hunting in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lizard for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether it was large or small, slaughtered and eating meat. I dreamed that I slaughtered and ate a dead lizard, by Ibn Sirin, Waseem Yusuf, and others. Interpretation of lizards and killers in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that seeing a lizard in a dream is an unpleasant vision, as the lizard symbolizes illness and exhaustion. If a person sees a lizard in a dream, this indicates that he is sick and tired. Ibn Sirin says that if a person dreams that he is killing a Bedouin lizard, this means that there is a deceitful man in that person’s life who is trying to steal his money, but he will not succeed. Dream interpretation jurists also say that the approaching A lizard from a person in a dream indicates that there is a state of sadness and pain that will befall that person. But if one sees in a dream that someone is killing or chasing a lizard, then this is a warning message from God to that person that there is someone who is actually trying to harm him. Ibn Sirin also says Seeing a lizard in a dream indicates a problem, a loss of money, and a warning to a person about some people around him in his life who are causing him a lot of trouble. But if a person sees a lizard stone in a dream, this indicates that there are many problems in that person’s life and that There are many people who cause him problems. In general, seeing a lizard in a dream is considered one of the unpleasant visions in a person’s life, and you must pay attention to this vision and take into account the people surrounding the person, especially if they appear with him in the dream. Interpretation of buying a lizard in a dream. If he sees in a dream that he bought A lizard and cooking it, this indicates that this person is eating forbidden food out of ignorance and hatred. Interpretation of eating a lizard in a dream But if a person sees in a dream that he is eating a lizard, this indicates that this person will contract a disease. Interpretation of catching a lizard in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that you see a lizard in A dream about a lizard chasing that person on the grounds that there is a Bedouin or Bedouin trying to reach that person to take his money. Interpretation of catching a lizard in a dream Dream interpretation experts say that if a person dreams that he is chasing a lizard or chasing it to kill it, this means that this person is a deceitful and deceitful person and that he is seizing On people's money, he also says that he catches a lizard and chases it in the dream, which indicates that this person seeks to earn money from the forbidden side. Interpretation of killing a lizard in a dream: This dream indicates that the dreamer will defeat an evil friend and find refuge from the evil of his enemies. As for killing a lizard in the house, it indicates the presence of enemies. Of relatives and family, but he will be able to distinguish them easily and deal with their evil ones. When a large number of dhabili is killed in a dream, this means that there are many enemies near its owner who are trying to harm him in every possible way, but they seem helpless. When a dhabili was killed, the bed was indicative of marriage. With a bad girl, and understanding this after a period of marriage and this relationship ending in separation. For a dead lizard on the road, the friendly neighbor is the one who hides the evil inside him. Seeing the lizard killed indicates that the dreamer will face a

title: Interpretation of fingers in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Are they good or bad?

preview.html: Interpretation of fingers in a dream: Fingers indicate a person’s feelings, how he feels about his external life, and the extent of his connection to his family, loved ones, and friends. These feelings can be good or bad. Therefore, it is difficult to determine whether seeing fingers is a good or undesirable vision, because it generally refers to a person’s inner feelings and does not describe the reality of the matter. In fact, it may carry an important message that you need to understand. Therefore, in this article, we present to you an encyclopedia site that interprets fingers in a dream. If you see that you are playing with your thumb, this is a sign of your sincere love for your friends. And that you depend on them for many things, but this dream tells you that you must be careful about these friends. Because even if they are not... All of them, there is one of them who mediates in the group, but he hates everyone and wants to create problems between you. So you have to focus, because he is the one who always creates problems and brings you the most important news that may bother you from others. Therefore, this person is not a friend, but rather a hidden enemy who tries not to Revealing himself so as not to reveal his relationship. As for seeing you playing with your middle finger on your hand, this is evidence of your anxiety about your financial future. The fear of large matters is coming, there may be a crisis that you are going through, but this dream is a sign that it will end soon. As for the interpretation Fingers in a dream, especially the middle finger, and wearing a ring with it, even if it is made of gold, is evidence. However, your financial situation will change and soon you will have a lot of money and all the fear that you feel about money. There is no need for it and it will end soon when you feel that you are financially sufficient and all your crises are over. And if you have debts, it means that they will end. If you dream that you have extra fingers on your hand, this is a sign of ample nourishment in life. Soon a lot of money will come to you, and you may inherit an inheritance. Or you will get a promotion at work that will increase your salary and thus Your finances will also improve. A wound on a finger in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of fingers in a dream for a single woman, especially if there is a wound on the finger, indicates that the dreamer is very involved in the affairs of others, preoccupies herself with the lives of others and focuses on important matters, and this may cause her to fall into Problems soon. Therefore, she should pay attention to this unpleasant habit and focus more on her life and affairs, because this is what is important. Ibn Sirin points out that the wound on an unmarried woman’s finger does not indicate that, but rather indicates that her emotional life is at risk. And that she will soon lose the one she loves. And if she gets engaged, this means that her engagement will not be completed. And perhaps this thing is doing her well and is not as harmful as she thinks, perhaps it is the emotional relationship that she is living in. It is an absolutely unhealthy relationship that causes psychological damage, and the interpretation of cutting fingers in a dream is that this indicates that you are getting rid of the things that bother you And they cause you pain, so this dream indicates the end of a difficult period and the departure of harmful people from your life, and if you see blood pouring out in a raid while she cuts your fingers, this is evidence that these relationships have caused you a lot of harm and

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman. The evidence for seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman varies, with some of the situations she goes through, whether she is pregnant or not, and she may witness the presence of blood on her clothes or in some other circumstances, which we will present in the lines of our article. Menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman. Dream experts point out that seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a married woman’s dream is an expression of bad actions that she continues to commit despite her knowledge, and that it can harm her religiously and psychologically. . It must be removed from it. It can be said that some of the things that a woman commits while watching this dream tarnish her life and her reputation among others, and harm her and her family, so these rude actions should be reconsidered. As for seeing menstrual blood in general, it is one of the visions that have undesirable connotations. Al-Nabulsi explains that it is a symbol of many disagreements, marital quarrels, and lack of trust during this period of the relationship. However, if a woman finds menstrual blood on her clothes and cleans them or throws them away, the idea indicates that she will get closer to the vagina and get rid of the despair and difficult problems she faces with her husband. To interpret your dream Accurately and quickly, Google is the dream interpretation site in Egypt. Seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. One of the signs of seeing menstrual blood on Ibn Sirin’s clothes is that it is a clear symbol of the mistakes a woman makes, which will make her deeply sad in the coming days because it will keep her away from Obedience turns it into disobedience. To God - Glory be to Him - this is enough to change comfortable circumstances into more difficult ones. It can be said that seeing menstrual blood on a married woman’s clothes is evidence of what she did to someone in the past, and this person is now trying to take advantage of her and may resort to bad methods of revenge. Therefore, you must ask this person to forgive and forgive what he did in the past. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing black menstrual blood is one of the disturbing things in the world of dreams, as it explains many marital problems that change the life of this most difficult married woman, in addition to the occurrence of many disorders. relating to her children. And the inability to understand it. On the other hand, it is believed that normal menstrual blood portends some happy things for a married woman, without spoiling her clothes or causing her severe pain, because in normal cases it portends a quick relief from seizures and a peaceful life, especially with her husband, God willing. Most important Interpretations of seeing menstrual blood on clothes in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about clothes stained with menstrual blood for a married woman. A group of interpreters predicts that seeing a stain of menstrual blood on a married woman’s clothes is not a pleasant event, as the dream shows severe remorse that she experienced during this period because of the bad things she did. against someone and feel sad about it. It is the moment because of the corruption of her life, and it can be said that these sins will haunt her
